channel.title: Shopping on The Miette
channel.description: Recent content in Shopping on The Miette

item.title: June Build Update
item.description: A June build update A lot of shopping and finally finishing sanding the cladding! Table Of Contents What we’ve done What’s next? What we’ve done The tail end of May and the month of June have been quite eventful, filled with a lot of shopping and unexpected visitors from far away states. Let’s dive right in! Our fanciest acquisition was a package of flathead brass screws that arrived in the mail.
